dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare tread upon the Sanctum of Shadows, vile necromancer. Your darkness ends here!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Bold words for an angel, but you and your Guardians will fall before my power!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such arrogance! It will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare to meet your end, Valeria!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The light always triumphs over darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough talk, let’s fight!
I will break you and your so-called light.
Maybe I have underestimated you. Let’s call a truce.
You will regret this decision.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The only regret will be yours.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Peace could be beneficial for both of us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: There is no peace for the wicked.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You talk too much for someone who is about to die.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: We shall see who draws their last breath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let’s end this now!
Your divine words mean nothing to me.
I seek to bring eternal night to these realms. Stand aside or face my wrath!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Eternal night? Over my dead body!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I shall grant your wish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then come and meet your end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You are foolish to defy me.
Let’s settle this with a fight!
Step aside, and I might spare your life.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I would rather fall in battle than betray my cause.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A noble sentiment, but ultimately futile.
So be it. Prepare to face oblivion.
You are but a pawn in a greater game.
I will crush you like the rest.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your hubris will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your sacrifice will not be in vain.
Why do you insist on protecting a world that is already lost?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: This world is not lost as long as we fight for it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Blind faith will lead you to ruin.
Your strength is but an illusion.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then an illusion you shall fall to.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Faith will crumble beneath my power.
Join me, and we can reshape this world together.
You will change your mind sooner or later.
A foolish choice, but expected.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your foolishness is veiled in shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your efforts are meaningless.
Meaningless in the grand scheme.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: We embrace our cause, even in death.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Hope is but a fleeting illusion.
